snippet.title: Heroes of the Storm™ Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description: Heroes of the Storm is a raucous online team brawler starring your favorite Blizzard characters. To learn much more, visit http://HeroesOfTheStorm.com, where in the weeks to come, you'll find tons of videos, hero profiles, game features, information on how to join the public beta test, and more.
